channel.title: Making a differant loading cache?
channel.description: So, I was wondering how to make a server load a differant cache. Like changing 601 loading 602 to 601 loading 634, or 317 loading 634. I really would appreciate 317 loading 634 :).

item.title: Making a differant loading cache?
item.dc:creator: @wienerscape wienerscape
item.description:
@wienerscape wrote:

yeah its possible, just not easy. You need to change the anims for every item, and every npc depending on the cache you are desiring to load.

Read full topic

item.title: Making a differant loading cache?
item.dc:creator: @arham_4 arham 4
item.description:
@arham_4 wrote:

CoonHunter:

The possibility of a 317 loading a 634 cache is beyond your grasp by far. Each client has a pre-set amount of items and such, as well as CRC checking. Until you can fix all of this, you will not be able to change the cache to a higher revision (lower MIGHT work, as long as it has the same amount of files)

okay, well is it possible for a 317 to load 525 or 508?

Read full topic

item.title: Making a differant loading cache?
item.dc:creator: @_kush †kush†
item.description:
@_kush wrote:

I think you would need a Cache Editor… no idea tbh, but my guess would be you need one, too get it too load 634.
